<xen:comment>
	TINYMCE BUTTONS FOR ALL BROWSERS EXCEPT IE7
</xen:comment>

@font-face
{
	font-family:'tinymce';
	src:url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce.eot');
	src:	url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce.svg#icomoon') format('svg'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce.woff') format('woff'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}

@font-face
{
	font-family:'tinymce-small';
	src:url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce-small.eot');
	src:	url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce-small.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce-small.svg#icomoon') format('svg'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce-small.woff') format('woff'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/tinymce-small.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}

.mce-ico
{
	font-family: 'tinymce',Arial;
	font-style: normal;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-variant: normal;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 16px;
	speak:none;
	vertical-align: text-top;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	display: inline-block;
	background: transparent center center;
	background-size: cover;
	width: 16px;
	height: 16px;
	color: #333;
}

.mce-btn-small .mce-ico
{
	font-family: 'tinymce-small',Arial;
}

modification.description: Integration of FA in the admin side

code_events.event:
Called when TinyMCE is initialized. There's no event hit here.

Callback signature:

$mceConfigObj

Arguments:

  1. $mceConfigObj - TinyMCE Config Object

    • Object Methods related to plugins

      • getMcePlugins() - Get Mce plugins
      • hasMcePlugin($pluginName) - Check if a plugin is enabled
      • addMcePlugin($pluginName) - Add a plugin

    • Object Methods related to settings

      • getMceSettings() - Get all Mce Settings
      • getMceSetting($setting) - Get one Mce Setting
      • overrideMceSettings(array $settings) - Override all Mce Settings
      • setMceSetting($name, $value) - Set one Mce Setting
      • unsetMceSetting($name) - Unset one Mce Setting
      • addBulkMceSettings(array $settings) - Add several Mce settings from an array
      • getMceGrid() - Get the Mce Buttons Grid
      • overrideMceGrid(array $mceGrid) - Override the Mce Buttons Grid

    • Object Methods related to params

      • getMceParams() - Get all Mce params
      • getMceParam($param) - Get one Mce param
      • overrideMceParams(array $params) - Override all Mce params
      • setMceParam($param, $value) - Set one Mce param
      • unsetMceParam($param) - Unset one Mce param
      • addBulkMceParams(array $params) - Add several Mce params from an array

    • Object Methods related to buttons

      • buttonIsEnabled($buttonName) - Check if a button is enabled
      • getAvailableButtons() - Get available buttons in an array without separator
      • addButton($buttonName, $line = 1, $pos = '#end', $openingSeparator = false, $endingSeparator = false, $insertBefore = false) - Add a button at the begin/end of a line or before/after and existed button, with or without an opening/ending separator
      • getMceButtonsExtraCss() - Get Mce Buttons Extra Css
      • overrideMceButtonsExtraCss(array $buttonsExtraCss) - Override all Mce Buttons Extra Css
      • addMceButtonExtraCss($buttonCode, $iconCode, $iconSet) - Add Extra Css for one button
      • deleteButtons(array $buttonsToDelete, array $buttonsToExclude = array(), $bypassForcedButtons = false) - Delete several buttons from config

    • Object Methods related to Menus

      • getMenuOrder() - Get menus order
      • overrideMenusOrder($menusOrder) - Override menus order
      • getMenuGrids() - Get menus grid
      • overrideMenuGrid($menuGrid) - Override menus grid
      • hasMenu($menuName) - Check if menu exists
      • addMenu($menuName, $pos = '#end', $menuTitle = '', array $menuItems = array(), $bypassAvailableButtons = false, $bypassForcedButtons = false) - Add a menu at the begin/end of the menus grid or before/after and existed menu
      • addMenuItem($menuItemName, $menuName, $pos = '#end', $openingSeparator = false, $endingSeparator = false, $insertBefore = false, $bypassAvailableButtons = false, $bypassForcedButtons = false) - Add a menu item at the begin/end of a menu or before/after and existed menu item from a menu, with or without an opening/ending separator
      • &findMenuItem($menuItemName, $menuName, array $commands = array()) -Find menu item - value return can be caught by reference
      • deleteMenuItem($menuItemName, $menuName, $deleteOpeningSeparator = false, $deleteClosingSeparator = false) -Delete menu item

    • Misc. Object Methods

      • getTemplateParams() - Get all template params
      • getTemplateParam($param) - Get one template param
      • getTemplateObject() - Get the template object
      • isMobile() - Check if visitor is using a mobile device
      • getEditorId() - Get the editor id
      • isCustomFieldsEditor($outputViewNameIfTrue = false) - Check if the editor is a custom fields editor

option.sub_options: bcolor justify xtable sub sup hr anchor format

phrases.phrase: Options for some Wysiwyg BbCodes provided with TinyQuattro
These options are made to modify/complete/fix some behaviours of XenForo
Once the maximum height is reached, an overflow will be applied.
Once the maximum height is reached, an overflow will be applied.
This minimum height will be activated when the editor is focused.
This minimum height will be activated when the QuickReply editor is focused.

If XenForo or an addon has set a height for the editor, this option will make TinyMCE follow this height (the minimum height & the maximum height will be the same). This option is disabled by default.

Note to developers:
- If you set the additional class "SmallEditor" to the Editor without setting a height, TinyMCE will get the min and max height of the QuickReply editor
- If you set the additional class "SmallEditor" to the Editor with setting a height, TinyMCE will use this height as the min and max height
- If you set 'minHeight' or 'maxHeight' in the editorOptions, TinyMCE will directly use these settings.
Once activated, this option will display a popup asking the user if he really wants to leave the page whereas the editor is not empty.
Automatically restore draft when editor is empty

If you set this option on "Yes" then, when a TinyMCE draft has been saved and the editor is empty, this draft will be automatically restore inside the editor. Once the message is sent, the draft will be erased. If you set this options on "No", the user can still get the draft back inside the editor. He just needs to manually click on the icon.
Select here the interval to auto save your draft (unit: seconds)
Select here how long your draft will be kept in memory (unit: minutes)

If you activate this option a context menu will be displayed when you click on the right button of your mouse. This context menu has some options in it. It is very useful if you use the tinymce table (you will have to activate this function inside the bbcode options).
If you need to use the browser original menu when you click on the right button of your mouse, just press the CTRL key. This will for example allow you to correct some wrong words with the browser dictionary.
Activate the BbCode > HTML Converter Patch?

This option will activate some fixes when you toggle the BbCode editor to the RTE editor. This fix generates a virtual BbCode pollution to look like the Html tags format.

This patch is disabled by default. Reason: its code is quite "acrobatic". On the other side, I've been using this html converter patch for several months without any problems on several boards. If you see any problems after having activated it, just disable it.

On old versions of XenForo (< 1.2), this option will enable some fixes when you toggle the RTE editor to the BbCode editor. On recent versions of XenForo (> 1.2), this option will be enabled every time the html content of the editor is converted to Bb Codes.

To make it simple, there are two kinds of fixes. The first one detects if the a tag has the same parent ([b]test 1 [b]test 2[/b] test 3[/b]) and the second one checks identical siblings ([b]test[/b] [b]test 2[/b])... in a recursive way. In other words, this patch helps to have a cleaner code.

This patch can be intensive for your server. With the default characters limit, it shouldn't be a problem. If you have set a high number or if you disable the limit and you have a very long message with many Bb Codes, then it would depend on your server configuration. It has been successfully tested with this kind of message and a server with a 128MB memory.

This patch is enable by default.
Disable inline edits on mobile devices?
When you edit a message, this option will disable the overlay and will load instead a new page. This option will only work with TinyMCE Quattro (and TinyMCE 3.x on XenForo 1.1.x).
This will disable TinyMCE 4 on mobile devices and will load your forum default editor.
This option is the same than the one above but for all whitespaces. Use this option only if you have to.

This function will emulate tabs in html by finding them in the raw text, wrapping them with a span tag which has the css property "white-space' set on "pre". Recommended value if you need that function: "Yes, without Bb Code content".

Important: This option requires the above setting ("Conversion of 4 whitespaces into a tab") to be activated.
With TinyMCE the browser spellcheck is disabled by default. If you want to activate it, select yes.
This option will extend the default TinyMCE command to force the editor to scroll down to the bottom of the inserted element and to resize the editor if needed. This option is disable by default.
This option will add a menu to the colors buttons (frontcolor/backcolor) to load a color picker.

The TinyMCE default list buttons have several options incompatible with the XenForo parser (it would need to be extendable to try to integrate them). This option must be set to "no" until XenForo becomes more open.

If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: anchor.

If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: bcolor.

These Bb Codes will be added to XenForo (only > 1.2) and will work with their TinyMCE Quattro functions, which means they will have a Wysiwyg output. They should work with the XenForo redactor too, but these functions and their buttons will have to be coded or activated (if someone wants this, feel free to do it, but I will not).

The "format" Bb Code must have an option: [format=option]. It can be: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, cust1, cust2 or cust3.

If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: anchor.
If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: hr.
If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: sub.
If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: sup.
Note: if you want to set some cellpadding, you will need to check if your table doesn't have the css setting "border-collapse" set on "collapse" but on "separate". Default: 7.
Note: if you want to set some cellspacing, you will need to check if your table doesn't have the css setting "border-collapse" set on "collapse" but on "seperate". Default: 7.
This max height in percentage will be used if an user sets a bigger height. Default: 100.
This max height in pixels will be used if an user sets a bigger height. Default: 1000.
This max width in percentage will be used if an user sets a bigger width. Default: 100.
This max width in pixels will be used if an user sets a bigger width. Default: 800.
This min height in percent will be used if an user sets a smaller height. Default: 15.
This min height in pixels will be used if an user sets a smaller height. Default: 150.
This min width in percent will be used if an user sets a smaller width. Default: 15.
This min width in pixels will be used if an user sets a smaller width. Default: 50.

If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: xtable.
This option will add a fast menu with an unlink option to the link button
Use small icons for fonts buttons?
This option will apply small icons to the font family & font size buttons. Default: no.
The fright mode will make some buttons float on the right of the editor
If you see any problems with TinyMCE once loaded in an overlay, enable this option. This will modify the XenForo Overlay (provided by jQueryTools) configuration. This is not needed with XenForo 1.2.
This will hide the html path inside the status bar.
Select here if the size of your buttons

The lazy loader of TinyMCE is a safe loading method that will use a jQuery extension to initialize TinyMCE and its plugins. It was needed when the JavaScript of the editor was loading by Ajax. Its inconvenient is it takes time: the main JavaScript is first loaded with Ajax, then reloaded again by the jQuery extension. The good news is wit the last version of this addon, this method should not be needed anymore. But if you have any problem to load the editor in an overlay window, you can try to enable this setting. Default: unckeck.

This option will enable the TinyMCE menu bar. This menu bar will be displayed above your buttons. It's a good way to reduce the number of your buttons.

A few things you have to know about the implementation of this feature in this addon
(1) The menu items are automatically managed (otherwise it might have been too complicated)
(2) To display a menu item, you just need to position its button inside the toolbar (with the BbCodes & Buttons Manager). If the button is not there, then the menu will not be there
(3) The button will be transformed to a menu item and will be automatically delete from the toolbar. If you don't want to delete this button (and then displayed both the menu item and the button, see below, there's an option for this.

Click on a button to prevent it to be deleted from the button bar (see the explanation in the previous option). If a button doesn't have an automatically function to add it to the menu bar then nothing changes: you don't need to click on its button.
Force collasped icons bar with custom fields editor?
The custom fields editors are the one used with the XenForo Resource Manager.
Force menu bar with custom fields editors?

With the last version of the XenForo Resources Manager, it can have several editors on the same page. By default the attachment manager will only allow you to load an image inside the main editor. Other editors have the class "No Attachment" that prevents them to have any image inserted. With this addon, images can be inserted in all editors by default. But inserted attachments will not be in the "view" so will be displayed as an "attachment" (the image will not display. A solution to bypass this is to insert the link of the image between the Bb Code image. If you want to use this workaround, activate this option.
Activate the BbCode > Wysiwyg HTML Parser Patch?

This option will activate some fixes when you edit a message with the RTE editor and when you toggle the Bb Code editor to the RTE editor.

This option is enabled by default.
Since XenForo 1.2.x, the Wysiwyg Editor will not load with Internet Explorer 7. Do you want to bypass this limit with TinyMCE?
Activate the RTE Editor on mobile devices (xen < 1.2) ?
This option will bypass the XenForo protection (all version below the 1.2) that prevents to load the Rich Text Editor (wysiwyg) on mobile devices.
Activate the conversion of 4 whitespaces into a tab before saving

This option will allow to convert 4 white spaces from the RTE editor to a real tabulation when you save your message.

This option is enabled by default.
Enable an user option for the RTE?
This will enable & activate an option to let users decide if they want to use or not the RTE editor on their personal mobile device.

Select this option if you want to activate by default the plain text mode when a user pastes a text inside the editor. He will be able to enable it again if you have inserted the plain text button inside the buttons bar.
This option will allow your users to resize the editor if they need to. Default: no.

Comma separated list of style properties to retain during the paste operation from Word. For example: "font-size,color". If you want to remove all style properties use an empty string "" or "none", false will cause an error in IE. If you want to keep all style properties, use "all" or "*". Default is "none".
Smilie menu item - display fast selection window?

If you are using the smilie menu item, it has by default two features: on hover it displays a window with some smilies to help your users to select them fastly ; on click it display one of the possible smilie window. If you don't want the first feature, uncheck this option.
Choose what kind of description should be displayed on mouse over.
[Smiley Manager] Use a category for the smiley Menu Button?

This option will only work with XenForo 1.3 or if you have installed the Smiley Manager, an addon created by Milano who allows you to manage your smilies by categories on XenForo 1.2. If you want to use a smiley category for the smiley menu button, just choose it here.
Show uncategorized smilies at the bottom?

The uncategorized smilies should be displayed as the first ones by default. Check this option if you want to display it as the last category. P.S: this feature will not work if you have selected the "Below box" display.

The "Modal all-in-one" is a modal window programmatically loaded (TinyMCE feature). It will have all the smilies and will be fast to display. Its height can be set in the styles properties.

The "Modal slider" is a modal window loaded with the XenForo overlay system. The smilies will be inside slides. Its height can be set in the styles properties.

The "Below box" is a smilies box inserted below the editor. This one is only compatible with XenForo 1.2.x versions or above.
This option will display a status bar below the editor

If you want to render the table bbcode in other editors (bbcode to html) or if you want to convert this html table to bbcode with other editors, activate this option. But be sure not to have an other wysiwyg table bbcode otherwise there will be a conflict.

One more thing, even if the bbcode is rendered in other editors it doesn't mean there will be special menus to modify your table. These ones will have to be coded or activated. But once activated, this addon "html to bbcode" engine for the table elements should work without any problems.

Default configuration: unchecked.
This will enable the TinyMCE text patterns like markdown inside the editor (ref).
This will collapse the full editor by default.

When the menu bar is enabled, a new function allows you to toggle the buttons bar. You can select here from which line the full editor will be toggled. For example, if you select 0, then all the buttons bar will be toggled. If you select 1, then the first line will be always visible; all lines after can be toggled. If there's no line after, the function will be greyed out.

Requires XenForo 1.2 or above - This option will activate the XenForo tagging functionality with TinyMCE.

If you have already installed the extension Tag Me, do not activate this option. The Tag Me addon has been created by xfrocks and provided advanced functionalities.

Default: no.
This option will activate the TinyMCE word count plugin.
Extend the Quote tag to make it wysiwyg
This feature is only available on TinyMCE and for XenForo versions above 1.2.x .

If you prefer to use the XenForo drafts system instead of the TinyMCE autosave plugin, select "yes". The first one is saving drafts in the database, the second in in the browser memory. The XenForo drafts system must have of course been activated in the XenForo options.

If you activate this option AND the XenForo page the editor is loading on is compatible with the XenForo drafts system, then the TinyMCE autosave plugin will be disabled. The draft button will look the same but will not work the same way. Clicking on it will display a menu to save or delete the draft from the database. But you can't manually get the draft back. You will have to reload the page.

If the XenForo page the editor is loading on is NOT compatible with the XenForo drafts system, then the TinyMCE autosave plugin will be loaded as usual with the settings you would have configured below.

Default value: "no".

Requires XenForo 1.2 or above - This option will activate the XenForo drag & drop upload function for TinyMCE.

Default: no.

Requires XenForo 1.2 or above - This option will activate theXenForo paste & upload image function for TinyMCE. How does it work: when you copy an image on your computer (ctrl+c) then paste it (ctrl+v) inside the editor, the image will be displayed (by default TinyMCE prevents local images to be displayed) and uploaded.
.
This function doesn't work if the paste mode "plain text" is enable.

Default: no.
Information: only works with Firefox at the moment.
Select here the number of smilies you would like to display in the button menu. Set 0 if you want to display all of them.
[Modal slider] Number of smilies per slide?
Select the number of smilies to display per slide. This option only works with the modal slider.

As stated above, the HTML > BbCode Converter can be intensive for your server with huge posts full of Bb Codes. If you didn't increase the maximum characters number in a message, everything should be ok. If you increased it, it might depend on the message and on your server configuration.

Instead of disabling this converter, you can enable it by setting the maximum tags to be processed (a Bb Code in a message might be processed several times to optimize the output). For reference, 1800 is a high number, 500 is a low number. If you don't want to set any limit, set 0 (default value).
You are no more connected. You should log again to avoid to lose your modifications.
Use the rich text editor with your mobile device?
If your mobile device is not compatible with the Rich Text Editor, just uncheck this option.
Insert a new link or email
Please use Ctrl+V/Cmd+V keyboard shortcuts to paste contents.

The below css template is the default css. It must be included with all dialog The below css template is the template that will be only use to customize this dialog The below line is the locaction of the Javascript file that will manage the submit function and, if you want, the "onafterload" callback. It can be anywhere and have the name you want. But its content must have a single Javascript Object named xenMCE.Templates.Bbm_yourTemplate. You just need to replace yourTemplate with the name of your template (here: demo). Below starts the dialog html content. There are several commands that will automatically perform some tasks for your. Examples: #classes# > mceTitle => will give a title to the modal window > mceFocus => will focus the field > mceSubmit => will change the title of the submit button > mceCancel => will change the title of the cancel button > mce-xen-content => css to use for the content of the overlay > ... (check the other dialogs to see the options (tabs/inputs inline/normal inputs, etc.) #name# > Every input tags (input, textarea, select) will be automatically send to the submit function (check the event "data"). Don't forget to specify a name attribute to get the data. > If you need another field or tag content to be send, just add it this data parameter: data-input (data-input="whatYouWant"). Both the content of the data-input parameter and the content content of its tag will be send to the submit function #template variables# > $selection.text => selection in raw format > $selection.html => selection in html format > $selection.bbCode => selection in BbCode format > $isUrl => if the selection is an Url (link or email) > $isLink => if the selection is a link > $isEmail => if the selection is an Email > $urlDatas.text => the url text > $urlDatas.href => the url link

}
.mce-i-arrowdown2 {

}
.mce-i-menu2 {
	-ie7-icon:"\e941"
}
.mce-i-newtab {
	-ie7-icon:"\e961"
}
.mce-i-a11y {

}
.mce-i-plus {

}
.mce-i-insert {
	-ie7-icon:"\e93a"
}
.mce-i-minus {

}
.mce-i-books {

}
.mce-i-reload {
	-ie7-icon:"\e906"
}
.mce-i-toc {
	-ie7-icon:"\e901"
}
.mce-i-checkmark {

.mce-i-checkbox,.mce-i-selected {

.mce-i-insert {

.mce-i-selected {

}
.mce-i-backcolor {
	background: {xen:property tinyquattro_icon_bckg_color}
}

<xen:set var="$_mcePrimaryDark">{xen:property quattroDark}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$_mcePrimaryLightish">{xen:property quattroLightish}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$_mcePrimaryLight">{xen:property quattroLight}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$_mcePrimaryLighterStill">{xen:property quattroLighterStill}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$_mcePrimaryLightest">{xen:property quattroLightest}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$_mceSecondaryMedium">{xen:property quattroAltMedium}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$_mceSecondaryLight">{xen:property quattroAltLight}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$_mceSecondaryLightest">{xen:property quattroAltLightest}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$_mceTextBoxBackground">{xen:property quattroTextBoxBckg}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$_mceMiscColor">{xen:property quattroMiscColor}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceGridBorder">{xen:property quattroGridBorder}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePanelBorder">{xen:property quattroPanelBorder}</xen:set>


<xen:set var="$mceToolTipColor">{xen:if '{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property quattroTooltipBckg}', '_lightness'} > 0.5', 
					'{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property quattroTooltipBckg}', 'darken', 80}', 
					'{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property quattroTooltipBckg}', 'lighten', 80}'
				}</xen:set>


<xen:set var="$mcePanelBackground">{$_mcePrimaryLighterStill}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceButtonBackground">{$_mcePrimaryLightest}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceMenuBackground">{$_mcePrimaryLightest}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceMenubarBgActive">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceButtonBackground}', 'darken', 10, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceMenuBarBorder">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePanelBorder}', 'mix', '{$mcePanelBackground}', 60, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceTextboxBackground">{$_mceTextBoxBackground}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceText">{$_mceText}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceTextboxDisable">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceText}', 'mix', '{$mceTextboxBackground}', 40, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceMenuItText">{$mceText}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceMenuItDisable">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceMenuItText}', 'mix', '{$mceMenuBackground}', 40, 'hex'}</xen:set>
 
<xen:set var="$mceCheckBoxDisable">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceText}', 'mix', '{$_mcePrimaryLighterStill}', 40, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceComboBoxDisable">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceText}', 'mix', '{$mceTextboxBackground}', 40, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceBorderColor">{$_mceBorderColor}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBorderColorMix">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBorderColor}', 'mix', '{$_mcePrimaryLighterStill}', 30, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceWindowHeadClose">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceText}', 'mix', '{$_mcePrimaryLightest}', 60, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceWindowHeadCloseHover">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceText}', 'mix', '{$_mcePrimaryLightest}', 40, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceTabOver">{$_mcePrimaryLighter}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceBtnGradientFrom">{$_mcePrimaryLightest}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBtnGradientTo">{$_mcePrimaryLighterStill}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBtnGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mceBtnGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceBtnHoverGradientFrom">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnGradientFrom}', 'darken', 5, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBtnHoverGradientTo">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnGradientTo}', 'darken', 5, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBtnHoverGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnHoverGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mceBtnHoverGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceBtnActiveGradientFrom">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnGradientFrom}', 'darken', 10, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBtnActiveGradientTo">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnGradientTo}', 'darken', 10, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceBtnActiveGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceBtnActiveGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mceBtnActiveGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mcePanelGradientFrom">{$_mcePrimaryLighterStill}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePanelGradientTo">{$_mcePrimaryLightest}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePanelGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePanelGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mcePanelGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryGradientFrom">{$_mceSecondaryLightest}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryGradientTo">{$_mceSecondaryLight}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mcePrimaryGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryHoverGradientFrom">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryGradientFrom}', 'darken', 5, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryHoverGradientTo">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryGradientTo}', 'darken', 5, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryHoverGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryHoverGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mcePrimaryHoverGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryActiveGradientFrom">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryGradientFrom}', 'darken', 10, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryActiveGradientTo">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryGradientTo}', 'darken', 10, 'hex'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mcePrimaryActiveGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mcePrimaryActiveGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mcePrimaryActiveGradientTo}', 50, 'hex'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$mceMenuItHvrGradientFrom">{$_mcePrimaryLightish}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceMenuItHvrGradientTo">{$_mcePrimaryDark}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$mceMenuItHvrGradientFallback">{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{$mceMenuItHvrGradientFrom}', 'mix', '{$mceMenuItHvrGradientTo}', 20, 'hex'}</xen:set>

.mce-container,.mce-container *,.mce-widget,.mce-widget *,.mce-reset {
	margin:0;
	padding:0;
	border:0;
	outline:0;
	vertical-align:top;
	background:transparent;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:{$mceText};
	font-family:Helvetica,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
	font-size:14px;
	text-shadow:none;
	float:none;
	position:static;
	width:auto;
	height:auto;
	white-space:nowrap;
	cursor:inherit;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent;
	line-height:normal;
	font-weight:normal;
	text-align:left;
	-moz-box-sizing:content-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;
	box-sizing:content-box;
	direction:ltr;
	max-width:none
}
.mce-widget button {
	-moz-box-sizing:border-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;
	box-sizing:border-box
}
.mce-container *[unselectable] {
	-moz-user-select:none;
	-webkit-user-select:none;
	-o-user-select:none;
	user-select:none
}

.mce-fade {
	opacity:0;
	-webkit-transition:opacity .15s linear;
	transition:opacity .15s linear
}
.mce-fade.mce-in {
	opacity:1
}
.mce-tinymce {
	visibility:inherit !important;
	position:relative
}
.mce-fullscreen {
	border:0;
	padding:0;
	margin:0;
	overflow:hidden;
	height:100%;
	z-index:100
}
div.mce-fullscreen {
	position:fixed;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	width:100%;
	height:auto
}
.mce-tinymce {
	display:block;
}
.mce-wordcount {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	right:0;
	padding:8px
}
div.mce-edit-area {
	background:{$_mceMiscColor} 
	filter:none
}
.mce-statusbar {
	position:relative
}
.mce-statusbar .mce-container-body {
	position:relative
}
.mce-fullscreen .mce-resizehandle {
	display:none
}
.mce-charmap {
	border-collapse:collapse
}
.mce-charmap td {
	cursor:default;
	border:1px solid {$mcePanelBorder};
	width:20px;
	height:20px;
	line-height:20px;
	*line-height:16px;
	text-align:center;
	vertical-align:middle;
	padding:2px
}
.mce-charmap td div {
	text-align:center
}
.mce-charmap td:hover {
	background:{$_mcePrimaryLighterStill}
}

.mce-grid td.mce-grid-cell div {
	border:1px solid {$mceGridBorder};
	width:15px;
	height:15px;
	margin:0px;
	cursor:pointer
}

.mce-grid td.mce-grid-cell div:focus {
	border-color:{$mceGridBorder}
}

.mce-grid td.mce-grid-cell div[disabled] {
	cursor:not-allowed
}

.mce-grid {
	border-spacing:2px;
	border-collapse:separate
}
.mce-grid a {
	display:block;
	border:1px solid transparent
}
.mce-grid a:hover, ,.mce-grid a:focus {
	border-color:{$mceGridBorder}
}
.mce-grid-border {
	margin:0 4px 0 4px
}
.mce-grid-border a {
	border-color:{$mceGridBorder};
	width:13px;
	height:13px
}
.mce-grid-border a:hover,.mce-grid-border a.mce-active {
	border-color:{$mceGridBorder};
	background:{$mceGridBorder}
}
.mce-text-center {
	text-align:center
}

div.mce-tinymce-inline {
	width:100%;
}

.mce-colorbtn-trans div {
	text-align:center;
	vertical-align:middle;
	font-weight:bold;
	font-size:20px;
	line-height:16px;
	color:#707070
}

.mce-monospace {
	font-family:"Courier New",Courier,monospace
}

.mce-toolbar-grp {
	padding:2px 0
}
.mce-toolbar-grp .mce-flow-layout-item {
	margin-bottom:0
}

.mce-rtl .mce-wordcount {
	left:0;
	right:auto
}

.mce-croprect-container {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:0
}
.mce-croprect-handle {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	width:20px;
	height:20px;
	border:2px solid #fff
}
.mce-croprect-handle-nw {
	border-width:2px 0 0 2px;
	margin:-2px 0 0 -2px;
	cursor:nw-resize;
	top:100px;
	left:100px
}
.mce-croprect-handle-ne {
	border-width:2px 2px 0 0;
	margin:-2px 0 0 -20px;
	cursor:ne-resize;
	top:100px;
	left:200px
}
.mce-croprect-handle-sw {
	border-width:0 0 2px 2px;
	margin:-20px 2px 0 -2px;
	cursor:sw-resize;
	top:200px;
	left:100px
}
.mce-croprect-handle-se {
	border-width:0 2px 2px 0;
	margin:-20px 0 0 -20px;
	cursor:se-resize;
	top:200px;
	left:200px
}
.mce-croprect-handle-move {
	position:absolute;
	cursor:move;
	border:0
}
.mce-croprect-block {
	opacity:.3;
	filter:alpha(opacity=30);
	zoom:1;
	position:absolute;
	background:#000
}
.mce-croprect-handle:focus {
	border-color:{$_mceSecondaryLight}
}
.mce-croprect-handle-move:focus {
	outline:1px solid {$_mceSecondaryLight}
}
.mce-imagepanel {
	overflow:auto;
	background:#000
}
.mce-imagepanel-bg {
	position:absolute;
	background:url('data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhDAAMAIABAMzMzP///ywAAAAADAAMAAACFoQfqYeabNyDMkBQb81Uat85nxguUAEAOw==')
}
.mce-imagepanel img {
	position:absolute
}
.mce-imagetool.mce-btn .mce-ico {
	display:block;
	width:20px;
	height:20px;
	text-align:center;
	line-height:20px;
	font-size:20px;
	padding:5px
}

.mce-arrow-up {
	margin-top:12px
}
.mce-arrow-down {
	margin-top:-12px
}
.mce-arrow:before,.mce-arrow:after {
	position:absolute;
	left:50%;
	display:block;
	width:0;
	height:0;
	border-style:solid;
	border-color:transparent;
	content:""
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-up:before {
	top:-9px;
	border-bottom-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	border-width:0 9px 9px;
	margin-left:-9px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-down:before {
	bottom:-9px;
	border-top-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	border-width:9px 9px 0;
	margin-left:-9px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-up:after {
	top:-8px;
	border-bottom-color:{$mcePanelGradientFallback};
	border-width:0 8px 8px;
	margin-left:-8px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-down:after {
	bottom:-8px;
	border-top-color:{$mcePanelGradientFallback};
	border-width:8px 8px 0;
	margin-left:-8px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left:before,.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left:after {
	margin:0
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left:before {
	left:8px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left:after {
	left:9px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right:before,.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right:after {
	left:auto;
	margin:0
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right:before {
	right:8px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right:after {
	right:9px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-center.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left:before {
	left:-9px;
	top:50%;
	border-right-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	border-width:9px 9px 9px 0;
	margin-top:-9px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-center.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left:after {
	left:-8px;
	top:50%;
	border-right-color:{$mcePanelGradientFallback};
	border-width:8px 8px 8px 0;
	margin-top:-8px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-center.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-left {
	margin-left:12px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-center.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right:before {
	right:-9px;
	top:50%;
	border-left-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	border-width:9px 0 9px 9px;
	margin-top:-9px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-center.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right:after {
	right:-8px;
	top:50%;
	border-left-color:{$mcePanelGradientFallback};
	border-width:8px 0 8px 8px;
	margin-top:-8px
}
.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-center.mce-arrow.mce-arrow-right {
	margin-left:-14px
}
.mce-edit-aria-container>.mce-container-body {
	display:flex
}
.mce-edit-aria-container>.mce-container-body .mce-edit-area {
	flex:1
}
.mce-edit-aria-container>.mce-container-body .mce-sidebar>.mce-container-body {
	display:flex;
	align-items:stretch;
	height:100%
}
.mce-edit-aria-container>.mce-container-body .mce-sidebar-panel {
	min-width:250px;
	max-width:250px;
	position:relative
}
.mce-edit-aria-container>.mce-container-body .mce-sidebar-panel>.mce-container-body {
	position:absolute;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	overflow:auto;
	top:0;
	left:0
}
.mce-sidebar-toolbar {
	border:0 solid rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	border-left-width:1px
}
.mce-sidebar-toolbar .mce-btn.mce-active,.mce-sidebar-toolbar .mce-btn.mce-active:hover {
	border:1px solid transparent;
	border-color:transparent;
	background-color:#2d8ac7
}
.mce-sidebar-toolbar .mce-btn.mce-active button,.mce-sidebar-toolbar .mce-btn.mce-active:hover button,.mce-sidebar-toolbar .mce-btn.mce-active button i,.mce-sidebar-toolbar .mce-btn.mce-active:hover button i {
	color:#fff;
	text-shadow:1px 1px none
}
.mce-sidebar-panel {
	border:0 solid rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	border-left-width:1px
}
.mce-container,.mce-container-body {
	display:block
}
.mce-autoscroll {
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-scrollbar {
	position:absolute;
	width:7px;
	height:100%;
	top:2px;
	right:2px;
	opacity:.4;
	filter:alpha(opacity=40);
	zoom:1
}
.mce-scrollbar-h {
	top:auto;
	right:auto;
	left:2px;
	bottom:2px;
	width:100%;
	height:7px
}
.mce-scrollbar-thumb {
	position:absolute;
	background-color:#000;
	border:1px solid #888;
	border-color:rgba(85,85,85,0.6);
	width:5px;
	height:100%;
}
.mce-scrollbar-h .mce-scrollbar-thumb {
	width:100%;
	height:5px
}
.mce-scrollbar:hover,.mce-scrollbar.mce-active {
	background-color:#AAA;
	opacity:.6;
	filter:alpha(opacity=60);
	zoom:1;
}
.mce-scroll {
	position:relative
}
.mce-panel {
	border:0 solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	background-color:{$mcePanelGradientFallback};
}
.mce-floatpanel {
	position:absolute;
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-fixed {
	position:fixed
}
.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow,.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow:after {
	position:absolute;
	display:block;
	width:0;
	height:0;
	border-color:transparent;
	border-style:solid
}
.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow {
	border-width:11px
}
.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow:after {
	border-width:10px;
	content:""
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover {
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(enabled = false);
	background:transparent;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	background:{$_mceMiscColor};
	border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);
	border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.25)
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom {
	margin-top:10px;
	*margin-top:0
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom>.mce-arrow {
	left:50%;
	margin-left:-11px;
	border-top-width:0;
	border-bottom-color:rgba(0,0,0,.2);
	border-bottom-color:rgba(0,0,0,.25);
	top:-11px
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom>.mce-arrow:after {
	top:1px;
	margin-left:-10px;
	border-top-width:0;
	border-bottom-color:{$_mcePrimaryLightest}
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-start {
	margin-left:-22px
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-start>.mce-arrow {
	left:20px
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-end {
	margin-left:22px
}
.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-end>.mce-arrow {
	right:10px;
	left:auto
}
.mce-fullscreen {
	border:0;
	padding:0;
	margin:0;
	overflow:hidden;
	height:100%
}
div.mce-fullscreen {
	position:fixed;
	top:0;
	left:0
}
#mce-modal-block {
	opacity:0;
	filter:alpha(opacity=0);
	zoom:1;
	position:fixed;
	left:0;
	top:0;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	background:#000
}
#mce-modal-block.mce-in {
	opacity:.3;
	filter:alpha(opacity=30);
	zoom:1
}
.mce-window-move {
	cursor:move
}
.mce-window {
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(enabled = false);
	background:transparent;
	background:{$_mcePrimaryLightest};
	position:fixed;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	opacity:0;
	transform:scale(.1);
	transition:transform 100ms ease-in,opacity 150ms ease-in
}
.mce-window.mce-in {
	transform:scale(1);
	opacity:1
}
.mce-window-head {
	padding:9px 15px;
	border-bottom:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	position:relative
}
.mce-window-head .mce-close {
	position:absolute;
	right:0;
	top:0;
	height:38px;
	width:38px;
	text-align:center;
	cursor:pointer
}
.mce-window-head .mce-close i {
	color:{$mceWindowHeadClose}
}
.mce-close:hover i{
	color:{$mceWindowHeadCloseHover}
}
.mce-window-head .mce-title {
	line-height:20px;
	font-size:20px;
	font-weight:bold;
	text-rendering:optimizelegibility;
	padding-right:20px
}
.mce-window .mce-container-body {
	display:block
}
.mce-foot {
	display:block;
	background-color:{$_mcePrimaryLightest};
	border-top:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
}
.mce-window-head .mce-dragh {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	cursor:move;
	width:90%;
	height:100%
}
.mce-window iframe {
	width:100%;
	height:100%
}
.mce-window-body .mce-listbox {
	border-color:#ccc
}
.mce-rtl .mce-window-head .mce-close {
	position:absolute;
	right:auto;
	left:15px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-window-head .mce-dragh {
	left:auto;
	right:0
}
.mce-rtl .mce-window-head .mce-title {
	direction:rtl;
	text-align:right
}

.mce-tooltip {
	position:absolute;
	padding:5px;
	opacity:.8;
	filter:alpha(opacity=80);
	zoom:1
}
.mce-tooltip-inner {
	font-size:11px;
	background-color:{xen:property quattroTooltipBckg};
	color:{$mceToolTipColor};
	max-width:200px;
	padding:5px 8px 4px 8px;
	text-align:center;
	white-space:normal
}

.mce-tooltip-arrow {
	position:absolute;
	width:0;
	height:0;
	line-height:0;
	border:5px dashed #000
}
.mce-tooltip-arrow-n {
	border-bottom-color:#000
}
.mce-tooltip-arrow-s {
	border-top-color:#000
}
.mce-tooltip-arrow-e {
	border-left-color:#000
}
.mce-tooltip-arrow-w {
	border-right-color:#000
}
.mce-tooltip-nw,.mce-tooltip-sw {
	margin-left:-14px
}
.mce-tooltip-ne,.mce-tooltip-se {
	margin-left:14px
}
.mce-tooltip-n .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	top:0;
	left:50%;
	margin-left:-5px;
	border-bottom-style:solid;
	border-top:none;
	border-left-color:transparent;
	border-right-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-nw .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	top:0;
	left:10px;
	border-bottom-style:solid;
	border-top:none;
	border-left-color:transparent;
	border-right-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-ne .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	top:0;
	right:10px;
	border-bottom-style:solid;
	border-top:none;
	border-left-color:transparent;
	border-right-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-s .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	bottom:0;
	left:50%;
	margin-left:-5px;
	border-top-style:solid;
	border-bottom:none;
	border-left-color:transparent;
	border-right-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-sw .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	bottom:0;
	left:10px;
	border-top-style:solid;
	border-bottom:none;
	border-left-color:transparent;
	border-right-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-se .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	bottom:0;
	right:10px;
	border-top-style:solid;
	border-bottom:none;
	border-left-color:transparent;
	border-right-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-e .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	right:0;
	top:50%;
	margin-top:-5px;
	border-left-style:solid;
	border-right:none;
	border-top-color:transparent;
	border-bottom-color:transparent
}
.mce-tooltip-w .mce-tooltip-arrow {
	left:0;
	top:50%;
	margin-top:-5px;
	border-right-style:solid;
	border-left:none;
	border-top-color:transparent;
	border-bottom-color:transparent
}
.mce-progress {
	display:inline-block;
	position:relative;
	height:20px
}
.mce-progress .mce-bar-container {
	display:inline-block;
	width:100px;
	height:100%;
	margin-right:8px;
	border:1px solid #ccc;
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-progress .mce-text {
	display:inline-block;
	margin-top:auto;
	margin-bottom:auto;
	font-size:14px;
	width:40px;
	color:{$mceText}
}
.mce-bar {
	display:block;
	width:0;
	height:100%;
	background-color:#d7d7d7;
	-webkit-transition:width .2s ease;
	transition:width .2s ease
}
.mce-notification {
	position:absolute;
	background-color:{$mceBtnGradientFallback};
	padding:5px;
	margin-top:5px;
	border-width:1px;
	border-style:solid;
	border-color:#ccc;
	transition:transform 100ms ease-in,opacity 150ms ease-in;
	opacity:0
}
.mce-notification.mce-in {
	opacity:1;
}
.mce-notification-success {
	background-color:#dff0d8;
	border-color:#d6e9c6
}
.mce-notification-info {
	background-color:#d9edf7;
	border-color:#779ecb
}
.mce-notification-warning {
	background-color:#fcf8e3;
	border-color:#faebcc
}
.mce-notification-error {
	background-color:#f2dede;
	border-color:#ebccd1
}
.mce-notification.mce-has-close {
	padding-right:15px
}
.mce-notification .mce-ico {
	margin-top:5px
}
.mce-notification-inner {
	display:inline-block;
	font-size:14px;
	margin:5px 8px 4px 8px;
	text-align:center;
	white-space:normal;
	color:#31708f
}
.mce-notification-inner a {
	text-decoration:underline;
	cursor:pointer
}
.mce-notification .mce-progress {
	margin-right:8px
}
.mce-notification .mce-progress .mce-text {
	margin-top:5px
}
.mce-notification *,.mce-notification .mce-progress .mce-text {
	color:{$mceText}
}
.mce-notification .mce-progress .mce-bar-container {
	border-color:#ccc
}
.mce-notification .mce-progress .mce-bar-container .mce-bar {
	background-color:{$mceText}
}
.mce-notification-success *,.mce-notification-success .mce-progress .mce-text {
	color:#3c763d
}
.mce-notification-success .mce-progress .mce-bar-container {
	border-color:#d6e9c6
}
.mce-notification-success .mce-progress .mce-bar-container .mce-bar {
	background-color:#3c763d
}
.mce-notification-info *,.mce-notification-info .mce-progress .mce-text {
	color:#31708f
}
.mce-notification-info .mce-progress .mce-bar-container {
	border-color:#779ecb
}
.mce-notification-info .mce-progress .mce-bar-container .mce-bar {
	background-color:#31708f
}
.mce-notification-warning *,.mce-notification-warning .mce-progress .mce-text {
	color:#8a6d3b
}
.mce-notification-warning .mce-progress .mce-bar-container {
	border-color:#faebcc
}
.mce-notification-warning .mce-progress .mce-bar-container .mce-bar {
	background-color:#8a6d3b
}
.mce-notification-error *,.mce-notification-error .mce-progress .mce-text {
	color:#a94442
}
.mce-notification-error .mce-progress .mce-bar-container {
	border-color:#ebccd1
}
.mce-notification-error .mce-progress .mce-bar-container .mce-bar {
	background-color:#a94442
}
.mce-notification .mce-close {
	position:absolute;
	top:6px;
	right:8px;
	font-size:20px;
	font-weight:bold;
	line-height:20px;
	color:#858585;
	cursor:pointer;
	height:20px;
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-abs-layout {
	position:relative
}
body .mce-abs-layout-item,.mce-abs-end {
	position:absolute
}
.mce-abs-end {
	width:1px;
	height:1px
}
.mce-container-body.mce-abs-layout {
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-btn {
	border:1px solid {$mceBorderColorMix};
	border-color:transparent transparent transparent transparent;
	position:relative;
	text-shadow:0 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.75);
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	*zoom:1;
	background-color:{$mceBtnGradientFallback};
	
}
.mce-btn:hover,.mce-btn:focus {
	color:{$mceText};
	background-color:{$mceBtnHoverGradientFallback};
	border-color:#ccc;
}
.mce-btn.mce-disabled button,.mce-btn.mce-disabled:hover button {
	cursor:default;
	opacity:.4;
	filter:alpha(opacity=40);
	zoom:1
}
.mce-btn.mce-active,.mce-btn.mce-active:hover {
	background-color:{$mceBtnActiveGradientFallback};
	border-color:#ccc	
}

.mce-btn:active {
	background-color:{$mceBtnActiveGradientFallback};
	border-color:#ccc
}

.mce-btn button {
	padding:4px 8px;
	font-size:14px;
	line-height:20px;
	*line-height:16px;
	cursor:pointer;
	color:{$mceText};
	text-align:center;
	overflow:visible;
	-webkit-appearance:none
}
.mce-btn button::-moz-focus-inner {
	border:0;
	padding:0
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property tinyquattro_iconshadow}">
	.mce-btn i {
		text-shadow:1px 1px none
	}
</xen:if>

.mce-primary.mce-btn-has-text {
	min-width:50px
}	
.mce-primary {
	color:{$_mceMiscColor};
	border:1px solid transparent;
	border-color:transparent;
	background-color:{$mcePrimaryGradientFallback};
}
.mce-primary:hover,.mce-primary:focus {
	background-color:{$mcePrimaryHoverGradientFallback};
	border-color:transparent;
}
.mce-primary.mce-disabled button,.mce-primary.mce-disabled:hover button {
	cursor:default;
	opacity:.4;
	filter:alpha(opacity=40);
	zoom:1
}
.mce-primary.mce-active,.mce-primary.mce-active:hover,.mce-primary:not(.mce-disabled):active {
	background-color:{$mcePrimaryActiveGradientFallback};
}
.mce-primary button,.mce-primary button i {
	color:{$_mceSecondaryDark};
	text-shadow:1px 1px none;
}
.mce-btn .mce-txt {
	font-size:inherit;
	line-height:inherit;
	color:inherit
}
.mce-btn-large button {
	padding:9px 14px;
	font-size:16px;
	line-height:normal
}
.mce-btn-large i {
	margin-top:2px
}
.mce-btn-small button {
	padding:1px 5px;
	font-size:12px;
	*padding-bottom:2px
}
.mce-btn-small i {
	line-height:20px;
	vertical-align:top;
	*line-height:18px
}
.mce-btn .mce-caret {
	margin-top:8px;
	margin-left:0
}
.mce-btn-small .mce-caret {
	margin-top:8px;
	margin-left:0
}
.mce-caret {
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	*zoom:1;
	width:0;
	height:0;
	vertical-align:top;
	border-top:4px solid {$mceText};
	border-right:4px solid transparent;
	border-left:4px solid transparent;
	content:""
}
.mce-disabled .mce-caret {
	border-top-color:{$mceBorderColor}
}
.mce-caret.mce-up {
	border-bottom:4px solid {$mceText};
	border-top:0
}
.mce-btn-flat {
	border:0;
	background:transparent;
	filter:none
}
.mce-btn-flat:hover,.mce-btn-flat.mce-active,.mce-btn-flat:focus,.mce-btn-flat:active {
	border:0;
	background:{$mceMenubarBgActive};
	filter:none;
}
.mce-btn-has-text .mce-ico {
	padding-right:5px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-btn button {
	direction:rtl
}
.mce-btn-group .mce-btn {
	border-width:1px;
	margin:0;
	margin-left:2px
}
.mce-btn-group:not(:first-child) {
	border-left:1px solid #d9d9d9; //check
	padding-left:3px;
	margin-left:3px
}
.mce-btn-group .mce-first {
	margin-left:0
}
.mce-btn-group .mce-btn.mce-flow-layout-item {
	margin:0
}
.mce-rtl .mce-btn-group .mce-btn {
	margin-left:0;
	margin-right:2px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-btn-group .mce-first {
	margin-right:0
}
.mce-rtl .mce-btn-group:not(:first-child) {
	border-left:none;
	border-right:1px solid #d9d9d9; //check
	padding-right:4px;
	margin-right:4px
}

.mce-checkbox {
	cursor:pointer
}
i.mce-i-checkbox {
	margin:0 3px 0 0;
	border:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryDark};
	background-color:{$mceBtnGradientFallback};
	text-indent:-10em;
	*font-size:0;
	*line-height:0;
	*text-indent:0;
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-checked i.mce-i-checkbox {
	color:{$mceText};
	font-size:16px;
	line-height:16px;
	text-indent:0
}
.mce-checkbox:focus i.mce-i-checkbox,.mce-checkbox.mce-focus i.mce-i-checkbox {
	border:1px solid {$_mceSecondaryMedium}
}
.mce-checkbox.mce-disabled .mce-label,.mce-checkbox.mce-disabled i.mce-i-checkbox {
	color:{$mceCheckBoxDisable}
}
.mce-checkbox .mce-label {
	vertical-align:middle
}
.mce-rtl .mce-checkbox {
	direction:rtl;
	text-align:right
}
.mce-rtl i.mce-i-checkbox {
	margin:0 0 0 3px
}
.mce-combobox {
	position:relative;
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	*zoom:1;
	*height:32px
}
.mce-combobox input {
	border:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	border-right-color: {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	height:28px
}
.mce-combobox.mce-disabled input {
	color:#adadad
}

.mce-combobox .mce-btn {
	border:1px solid {$mceBorderColorMix};
	border-left:0;
	margin:0
}
.mce-combobox button {
	padding-right:8px;
	padding-left:8px
}
.mce-combobox.mce-disabled .mce-btn button {
	cursor:default;
	opacity:.4;
	filter:alpha(opacity=40);
	zoom:1
}
.mce-combobox .mce-status {
	position:absolute;
	right:2px;
	top:50%;
	line-height:16px;
	margin-top:-8px;
	font-size:12px;
	width:15px;
	height:15px;
	text-align:center;
	cursor:pointer
}
.mce-combobox.mce-has-status input {
	padding-right:20px
}
.mce-combobox.mce-has-open .mce-status {
	right:37px
}
.mce-combobox .mce-status.mce-i-warning {
	color:#c09853
}
.mce-combobox .mce-status.mce-i-checkmark {
	color:#468847
}
.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu {
	border-top:0;
	margin-top:0;
	max-height:200px
}
.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu .mce-menu-item {
	padding:4px 6px 4px 4px;
	font-size:11px
}
.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu .mce-menu-item-sep {
	padding:0
}
.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu .mce-text {
	font-size:11px
}
.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu .mce-menu-item-link,.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu .mce-menu-item-link b {
	font-size:11px
}
.mce-menu.mce-combobox-menu .mce-text b {
	font-size:11px
}
.mce-colorbox i {
	border:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	width:14px;
	height:14px
}
.mce-colorbutton .mce-ico {
	position:relative
}
.mce-colorbutton-grid {
	margin:4px
}
.mce-colorbutton button {
	padding-right:6px;
	padding-left:6px
}
.mce-colorbutton .mce-preview {
	padding-right:3px;
	display:block;
	position:absolute;
	left:50%;
	top:50%;
	margin-left:-17px;
	margin-top:7px;
	background:gray;
	width:13px;
	height:2px;
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-colorbutton.mce-btn-small .mce-preview {
	margin-left:-16px;
	padding-right:0;
	width:16px
}
.mce-colorbutton .mce-open {
	border-color:#ccc
}
.mce-colorbutton:hover .mce-open {
	border-left-color:{$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	border-right-color:{$_mcePrimaryLighter}
}
.mce-colorbutton.mce-btn-small .mce-open {
	padding:0 3px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-colorbutton {
	direction:rtl
}
.mce-rtl .mce-colorbutton .mce-preview {
	margin-left:0;
	padding-right:0;
	padding-left:3px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-colorbutton.mce-btn-small .mce-preview {
	margin-left:0;
	padding-right:0;
	padding-left:2px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-colorbutton button {
	padding-right:10px;
	padding-left:10px
}
.mce-rtl .mce-colorbutton .mce-open {
	padding-left:4px;
	padding-right:4px;
	border-left:0
}

.mce-colorpicker {
	position:relative;
	width:250px;
	height:220px
}
.mce-colorpicker-sv {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	width:90%;
	height:100%;
	border:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	cursor:crosshair;
	overflow:hidden
}
.mce-colorpicker-h-chunk {
	width:100%
}
.mce-colorpicker-overlay1,.mce-colorpicker-overlay2 {
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:0
}
.mce-colorpicker-overlay1 {
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=1,startColorstr='#ffffff',endColorstr='#00ffffff');
	-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=1,startColorstr='#ffffff',endColorstr='#00ffffff')";
	background:linear-gradient(to right,#fff,rgba(255,255,255,0))
}
.mce-colorpicker-overlay2 {
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=0,startColorstr='#00000000',endColorstr='#000000');
	-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=0,startColorstr='#00000000',endColorstr='#000000')";
	background:linear-gradient(to bottom,rgba(0,0,0,0),#000)
}
.mce-colorpicker-selector1 {
	background:none;
	position:absolute;
	width:12px;
	height:12px;
	margin:-8px 0 0 -8px;
	border:1px solid black;
	border-radius:50%
}
.mce-colorpicker-selector2 {
	position:absolute;
	width:10px;
	height:10px;
	border:1px solid white;
	border-radius:50%
}
.mce-colorpicker-h {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	right:0;
	width:6.5%;
	height:100%;
	border:1px solid {$_mcePrimaryLighter};
	cursor:crosshair
}
.mce-colorpicker-h-marker {
	margin-top:-4px;
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:-1px;
	width:100%;
	border:1px solid #333;
	background:#fff;
	height:4px;
	z-index:100
}

.mce-path {
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	*zoom:1;
	padding:8px;
	white-space:normal
}
.mce-path .mce-txt {
	display:inline-block;
	padding-right:3px
}
.mce-path .mce-path-body {
	display:inline-block
}
.mce-path-item {
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	*zoom:1;
	cursor:pointer;
	color:{$mceText}
}
.mce-path-item:hover {
	text-decoration:underline
}
.mce-path-item:focus {
	background:#666;
	color:{$_mceMiscColor} }
.mce-path .mce-divider {
	display:inline
}
.mce-disabled .mce-path-item {
	color:#aaa
}
.mce-rtl .mce-path {
	direction:rtl
}
.mce-fieldset {

}
.mce-fieldset>.mce-container-body {
	margin-top:-15px
}
.mce-fieldset-title {
	margin-left:5px;
	padding:0 5px
}
.mce-fit-layout {
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	*zoom:1
}
.mce-fit-layout-item {
	position:absolute
}
.mce-flow-layout-item {

}
.mce-flow-layout-item {
	margin:2px 0 2px 2px
}
.mce-flow-layout-item.mce-last {

}
.mce-flow-layout {

.mce-tinymce-inline .mce-flow-layout {

}
.mce-rtl .mce-flow-layout {

}
.mce-rtl .mce-flow-layout-item.mce-last {

.mce-iframe {
	border:0 solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);

}
.mce-infobox {
	display:inline-block;

	*zoom:1;
	text-shadow:0 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.75);

	border:1px solid red
}
.mce-infobox div {
	display:block;
	margin:5px
}
.mce-infobox div button {
	position:absolute;
	top:50%;

	cursor:pointer;
	margin-top:-8px;

}
.mce-infobox div button:focus {
	outline:2px solid #ccc
}
.mce-infobox.mce-has-help div {

}
.mce-infobox.mce-has-help button {

}
.mce-infobox.mce-success {
	background:#dff0d8;
	border-color:#d6e9c6
}
.mce-infobox.mce-success div {

<xen:comment>With the default TinyMCE skin, Font-Awesome main css properties needs to be loaded after.
	Let's add a prefix to avoid any problems. FA source: 4.3.0</xen:comment>

{$faCssPrefix} .fa {
  display: inline-block;
  font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
  font-size: inherit;
  text-rendering: auto;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  transform: translate(0, 0);
}
/* makes the font 33% larger relative to the icon container */
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-lg {
  font-size: 1.33333333em;
  line-height: 0.75em;
  vertical-align: -15%;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-2x {
  font-size: 2em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-3x {
  font-size: 3em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-4x {
  font-size: 4em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-5x {
  font-size: 5em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-fw {
  width: 1.28571429em;
  text-align: center;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-ul {
  padding-left: 0;
  margin-left: 2.14285714em;
  list-style-type: none;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-ul > li {
  position: relative;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-li {
  position: absolute;
  left: -2.14285714em;
  width: 2.14285714em;
  top: 0.14285714em;
  text-align: center;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-li{$faCssPrefix} .fa-lg {
  left: -1.85714286em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-border {
  padding: .2em .25em .15em;
  border: solid 0.08em #eeeeee;
  border-radius: .1em;
}
.pull-right {
  float: right;
}
.pull-left {
  float: left;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa.pull-left {
  margin-right: .3em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa.pull-right {
  margin-left: .3em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-spin {
  -webkit-animation: fa-spin 2s infinite linear;
  animation: fa-spin 2s infinite linear;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-pulse {
  -webkit-animation: fa-spin 1s infinite steps(8);
  animation: fa-spin 1s infinite steps(8);
}
@-webkit-keyframes fa-spin {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(359deg);
    transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
@keyframes fa-spin {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(359deg);
    transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-rotate-90 {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=1);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
  -ms-transform: rotate(90deg);
  transform: rotate(90deg);
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-rotate-180 {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=2);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg);
  -ms-transform: rotate(180deg);
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-rotate-270 {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=3);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(270deg);
  -ms-transform: rotate(270deg);
  transform: rotate(270deg);
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-flip-horizontal {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=0, mirror=1);
  -webkit-transform: scale(-1, 1);
  -ms-transform: scale(-1, 1);
  transform: scale(-1, 1);
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-flip-vertical {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=2, mirror=1);
  -webkit-transform: scale(1, -1);
  -ms-transform: scale(1, -1);
  transform: scale(1, -1);
}
:root {$faCssPrefix} .fa-rotate-90,
:root {$faCssPrefix} .fa-rotate-180,
:root {$faCssPrefix} .fa-rotate-270,
:root {$faCssPrefix} .fa-flip-horizontal,
:root {$faCssPrefix} .fa-flip-vertical {
  filter: none;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-stack {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  width: 2em;
  height: 2em;
  line-height: 2em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-stack-1x,
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-stack-2x {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-stack-1x {
  line-height: inherit;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-stack-2x {
  font-size: 2em;
}
{$faCssPrefix} .fa-inverse {
  color: #ffffff;
}

<xen:if is="{$customBbCodes}">
	<xen:foreach loop="$customBbCodes" key="$bbCodeTag" value="$bbCode">
		<xen:if is="{$bbCode.editor_icon_url}">
			html .mce-tinymce .mce-xen-custom .mce-i-custom_{$bbCodeTag}

				background-image: url('{$bbCode.editor_icon_url}');

	overflow:auto;
}

.mce-container .mceQuattroSmilieBlock a,
.mce-container .mceQuattroSmilieBlockFull a{
	white-space: normal;
}

.mce-container .mceQuattroSmilieBlock > img,
.mce-container .mceQuattroSmilieBlockFull > img,
.mce-container .mceQuattroSmilie{
	margin:2px;
	cursor: pointer;
}

<xen:comment>Fix for Chrome with QuickReply</xen:comment>
.mce-edit-area
{
	margin-right:1px !important;
}


<xen:comment>Color picker old style (get back layout before 4.0.7 version)</xen:comment>
.mce-grid td div {
	border-color: #808080 !important;
}
.mce-grid td div:hover {
	border-color:black !important;
}
.mce-grid td div:focus {
	border-color:#59a5e1 !important;
	outline:1px solid rgba(82,168,236,0.8);
	border-color:rgba(82,168,236,0.8) !important;
}

<xen:comment>Dropping box</xen:comment>
.mce-tinymce .quattro_editor_drop {
	display: none;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	border: 2px dashed #aaa;
	color: #000;
	background: rgba(190, 190, 190, .5);
}

	.mce-tinymce .quattro_editor_drop.dragDisabled
	{
		background: rgba(190, 140, 140, .5);
		border-color: rgb(150, 75, 75);
	}

	.mce-tinymce .quattro_editor_drop span {
		display: block;
		text-align: center;
		position: absolute;
		top: 50%;
		width: 100%;
		font-size: 18px;
		line-height: 26px;
		margin-top: -13px;
	}

	.mce-tinymce .quattro_editor_drop.hover {
		display: block;
	}
	
<xen:comment>Fullscreen</xen:comment>
.mce-fullscreen{
	overflow:hidden !important;
}

<xen:comment>Responsive Modal</xen:comment>
.mce-floatpanel .mce-foot.responsive .mce-container-body{
	text-align: center;
}

.mce-floatpanel .mce-foot.responsive .mce-btn{
	position: static;
	margin: 3px;
}

<xen:comment>
	EDITOR IFRAME CONTENT CSS
</xen:comment>

body.mce-content-body {
	{xen:property html.background}
	
	{xen:property html.font}
	
	{xen:property body.background}

	{xen:property body.font}
	
	{xen:property content.background}

	{xen:property content.font}

	{xen:property primaryContent.background}

	{xen:property primaryContent.font}
	
	{xen:property messageInfo.background}

	{xen:property messageInfo.font}

	{xen:property messageText}
	
	background-image: none;
	
	{xen:property editorContent}
	
	scrollbar-3dlight-color:#f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-arrow-color:#676662;
	scrollbar-base-color:#f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-darkshadow-color:#ddd;
	scrollbar-face-color:#e0e0dd;
	scrollbar-highlight-color:#f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-shadow-color:#f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-track-color:#f5f5f5
}

body, td, pre
{	
	margin:8px;
	word-wrap: break-word;
}

p { margin: 0; padding: 0; }

td,th {
	font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
	font-size: 11px;
}

.mce-content-body .mce-reset {
	margin:0;
	padding:0;
	border:0;
	outline:0;
	vertical-align:top;
	background:transparent;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:{xen:property contentText};
	font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-size:11pt;
	text-shadow:none;
	float:none;
	position:static;
	width:auto;
	height:auto;
	white-space:nowrap;
	cursor:inherit;
	line-height:normal;
	font-weight:normal;
	text-align:left;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent;
	-moz-box-sizing:content-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;
	box-sizing:content-box;
	direction:ltr;
	max-width:none
}

.mce-object {
	border: 1px dotted #3a3a3a;
	background: #d5d5d5 url(styles/sedo/tinyquattro/img/object.gif) no-repeat center;
}

.mce-preview-object {
	display:inline-block;
	position:relative;
	margin:0 2px 0 2px;
	line-height:0;
	border:1px solid gray
}
.mce-preview-object .mce-shim {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	background:url(data:image/gif;
	base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
}
figure.align-left {
	float:left
}
figure.align-right {
	float:right
}
figure.image.align-center {
	display:table;
	margin-left:auto;
	margin-right:auto
}
figure.image {
	display:inline-block;
	border:1px solid gray;
	margin:0 2px 0 1px;
	background:#f5f2f0
}
figure.image img {
	margin:8px 8px 0 8px
}
figure.image figcaption {
	margin:6px 8px 6px 8px;
	text-align:center
}
.mce-preview-object[data-mce-selected="2"] .mce-shim {
	display:none
}
.mce-pagebreak {
	cursor: default;
	display: block;
	border: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 5px;
	border: 1px dashed #666;
	margin-top: 15px;
	page-break-before:always
}
@media print {
	.mce-pagebreak {
		border:0
	}
}

.mce-item-anchor {
	cursor:default;
	display:inline-block;
	-webkit-user-select:all;
	-webkit-user-modify:read-only;
	-moz-user-select:all;
	-moz-user-modify:read-only;
	user-select:all;
	user-modify:read-only;
	width:9px !important;
	height:9px !important;
	border:1px dotted #3a3a3a;
	background: #d5d5d5 url(styles/sedo/tinyquattro/img/anchor.gif) no-repeat center;
}

.mce-nbsp,.mce-shy {
	background:#aaa
}
.mce-shy::after {
	content:'-'
}

hr {
	cursor: default;
}

.mce-match-marker {
	background:#aaa;
	color:#fff
}
.mce-match-marker-selected {
	background:#39f;
	color:#fff
}

.mce-spellchecker-word {
	border-bottom:2px solid #f00;
	cursor:default
}
.mce-spellchecker-grammar {
	border-bottom:2px solid #008000;
	cursor:default
}

.mce-item-table,.mce-item-table td,.mce-item-table th,.mce-item-table caption {
	border: 1px dashed {xen:property primaryDark};
}

td.mce-item-selected,th.mce-item-selected {
	background-color: #39f!important;
}

.mce-edit-focus {
	outline: 1px dotted #333;
}

.mce-content-body *[contentEditable=false] *[contentEditable=true]:focus {
	outline:2px solid #2d8ac7
}
.mce-content-body *[contentEditable=false] *[contentEditable=true]:hover {
	outline:2px solid #7acaff
}
.mce-content-body *[contentEditable=false][data-mce-selected] {
	outline:2px solid #2d8ac7
}
.mce-resize-bar-dragging {
	background-color:blue;
	opacity:.25;
	filter:alpha(opacity=25);
	zoom: 1
}

a:link,
a:visited
{
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property link}}
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property ugcLink}}
}

h1 { font-size: 2em; }
h2 { font-size: 1.5em; }
h3 { font-size: 1.17em; }
h4 { font-size: 1em; }
h5 { font-size: .83em; }
h6 { font-size: .75em; }

blockquote.mce_quote {
	border-left: 1px dotted {xen:property secondaryMedium};
	padding-left: 5px;
	background-color: {xen:property secondaryLightest};
}

h1.quattro_sf{{xen:property quattro_sf_h1}}
h2.quattro_sf{{xen:property quattro_sf_h2}}
h3.quattro_sf{{xen:property quattro_sf_h3}}
h4.quattro_sf{{xen:property quattro_sf_h4}}
h5.quattro_sf{{xen:property quattro_sf_h5}}
h6.quattro_sf{{xen:property quattro_sf_h6}}

.quattro_sf.cust1{{xen:property quattro_sf_custom1}}
.quattro_sf.cust2{{xen:property quattro_sf_custom2}}
.quattro_sf.cust3{{xen:property quattro_sf_custom3}}

<xen:include template="bb_code_base.css" />
<xen:include template="bb_code.css" />
<xen:if is="{$smilieSprites}">
	<xen:foreach loop="{$smilieSprites}" key="{$smilieId}" value="{$smilieSprite}">
		<xen:if is="{$smilieSprite.sprite_css}">
			img.mceQuattroSmilieSprite.mceSmilie{$smilieId}{
				{xen:raw $smilieSprite.sprite_css}
			}
		</xen:if>
	</xen:foreach>
</xen:if>

<xen:set var="$mceVersion">{xen:helper get_mce_js_version}</xen:set> <xen:if is="{$quattroIntegration}"><xen:require js="js/sedo/tinyquattro/integration/retro_quickreply.js{$mceVersion}" /></xen:if>
<xen:comment>Load MCE4 main JS</xen:comment> <xen:require js="js/sedo/tinyquattro/tinymce/jquery.tinymce.min.js{$mceVersion}" /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/tinyquattro/tinymce/tinymce.min.js{$mceVersion}" /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/tinyquattro/integration/loader.min.js{$mceVersion}" />
<xen:comment>Load MCE CSS && Custom Buttons CSS</xen:comment> <xen:if is="{$visitor.getBrowser.IEis} != 7"><xen:require css="tiny_quattro_editor.css" /><xen:else /><xen:require css="tiny_quattro_editor_ie7.css" /></xen:if> <style type="text/css">{xen:raw $mceBtnCss}</style>

Contents will now be pasted as plain text until you toggle this option off.": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_paste_plain_alert_message}}", "Please use Ctrl+V/Cmd+V keyboard shortcuts to paste contents.": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_paste_alert_message}}", "Prev": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_prev}}", "Redo": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_redo}}", "Replace": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_replace}}", "Replace all": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_replace_all}}", "Replace with": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_replacewith}}", "Show full editor": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_show_full_editor}}", "Select all": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_selectall}}", "Smilies": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase smilies}}", "Smilies picker": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_smiliespicker}}", "Special character": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_specialcharacters}}", "Spoiler Title": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_spoiler_title}}", "Source code": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_source_code}}", "Spoiler": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_spoiler}}", "Strikethrough": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_strikethrough}}", "Tools": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_tools}}", "Underline": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_underline}}", "Undo": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_undo}}", "Unlink": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase unlink}}", "uploads_are_not_available" : "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase uploads_are_not_available}}", "View": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_view}}", "Whole words": "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase sedo_quattro_whole_words}}", "Words: {0}": "{xen:jsescape {xen:if "in_array({$xenOptions.quattro_wordcount}, array('char','charwp'))", "{xen:phrase sedo_quattro_characters}", "{xen:phrase sedo_quattro_words}"}}" }

<xen:if is="{$smilieSprites}">
	<xen:foreach loop="{$smilieSprites}" key="{$smilieId}" value="{$smilieSprite}">
		<xen:if is="{$smilieSprite.sprite_css}">
			img.mceQuattroSmilieSprite.mceSmilie{$smilieId}{
				{xen:raw $smilieSprite.sprite_css}
			}
		</xen:if>
	</xen:foreach>
</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
	Buttons - XenForo config
</xen:comment>

@font-face
{
	font-family:'xenforo-small';
	src:url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo-small.eot');
	src:	url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo-small.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo-small.svg#icomoon') format('svg'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo-small.woff') format('woff'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo-small.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}


@font-face
{
	font-family:'xenforo';
	src:url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo.eot');
	src:	url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo.svg#icomoon') format('svg'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo.woff') format('woff'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/xenforo.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}

.mce-ico.mce-xenforo-icons
{
	font-family: 'xenforo',Arial;
}

.mce-btn-small .mce-ico.mce-xenforo-icons
{
	font-family: 'xenforo-small',Arial;
}


<xen:comment>Original icon set</xen:comment>
.mce-i-xen_nonbreaking:before		{ content: "\e025"; }

<xen:comment>XenForo icon set</xen:comment>
.mce-i-xen_switch:before		{ content: "\e01a"; }
.mce-i-xen_code:before			{ content: "\e000"; }
.mce-i-xen_quote:before			{ content: "\e009"; }
.mce-i-xen_smilies_picker:before	{ content: "\e035"; }
.mce-i-xen_fontfamily:before		{ content: "\e447"; }
.mce-i-xen_fontsize:before		{ content: "\e448"; }
.mce-i-xen_spoiler:before		{ content: "\e02c"; }

</xen:comment>
